LanguageData.HSSteelDrop.label: steel drop
LanguageData.HSSteelDrop.description: Call for a drop of 250 steel.
LanguageData.HSKokuDrop.label: koku drop
LanguageData.HSKokuDrop.description: Call for a drop of 4 koku, which is 75 rice per koku. Koku can be unbundled at a crafting spot or cooking station.
LanguageData.HSSilverDrop.label: silver drop
LanguageData.HSSilverDrop.description: Call for a drop of 500 silver.
LanguageData.HSHerbalMedDrop.label: herbal medicine drop
LanguageData.HSHerbalMedDrop.description: Call for a drop of herbal medicine.
LanguageData.HSCallLaborerTeam.label: call laborer team
LanguageData.HSCallLaborerTeam.description: Call a group of 5 peasants to assist you for 4 days. These workers can only do general labor tasks. You can control them as though they were your own colonists. You are required to keep them safe.
LanguageData.HSCallLaborerGang.label: call laborer gang
LanguageData.HSCallLaborerGang.description: Call a group of 10 peasants to assist you for 4 days. These workers can only do general labor tasks. You can control them as though they were your own colonists. You are required to keep them safe.
LanguageData.HSLegendaryWeaponRequest.label: request a legendary katana
LanguageData.HSLegendaryWeaponRequest.description: send a request to the shogun asking that they grant you a legendary katana from their vault.
LanguageData.HSCallMilitaryAidSmall.label: call novice samurai warband
LanguageData.HSCallMilitaryAidSmall.description: Call a group of 6 novice samurai to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.HSCallMilitaryAidLarge.label: call capable samurai warband
LanguageData.HSCallMilitaryAidLarge.description: Call a group of 4 capable samurai to aid you in battle.
LanguageData.HSCallShinobiSD.label: call for shinobi aid
LanguageData.HSCallShinobiSD.description: Call a group of mysterious shinobi blade masters
LanguageData.HSCallMilitaryAidGrand.label: call veteran samurai warband
LanguageData.HSCallMilitaryAidGrand.description: Call a group of 4 veteran samurai to aid you in battle.
